intervals.description: Replace engine oil. Warm engine first for complete drain. No spin-on oil filter — clean the centrifugal oil filter screen at every other oil change.
Drain and replace final drive gear oil. Check drain and fill plugs for metal debris indicating gear wear.
intervals.torque_spec: Drain plug: 9 lb-ft (12 Nm), Fill plug: 9 lb-ft (12 Nm)

intervals.description: Remove CVT cover and inspect drive belt for cracks, fraying, glazing, and width. Replace belt if width is below service limit or any damage is found.
Replace CVT drive belt regardless of condition. Inspect variator and clutch faces for wear or scoring at the same time.
Remove variator and inspect roller weights for flat spots, uneven wear, or reduced diameter. Replace as a set if any roller is out of spec.
Remove and clean air filter element. Replace element every 8,000 km or sooner if damaged. Inspect more frequently in dusty conditions.
Replace spark plug. Check electrode condition, carbon fouling, and gap before install.
Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances with engine cold. Scooter engines require more frequent checks due to high RPM operation. Intake: 0.05-0.10mm, Exhaust: 0.08-0.13mm.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Bleed system completely until fluid runs clear. Check hoses for cracking or swelling.
Check front and rear brake pad thickness. Replace when pad material reaches wear indicator groove or minimum thickness of 1.0mm.
Inspect and adjust throttle cable free play (2-6mm at grip). Lubricate cable with cable lubricant. Check for smooth operation through full range.
